scripts.build-react:stage: env-cmd --environments stage           react-scripts build && env-cmd --environments stage node build-service-worker.js
scripts.build-react:production: env-cmd --environments production react-scripts build && env-cmd --environments production node build-service-worker.js
scripts.build:production: env-cmd --environments production   dotnet publish ../parole.csproj -c Release -r win10-x64 --self-contained false && npm run copy:build
scripts.build:stage: env-cmd --environments stage             dotnet publish ../parole.csproj -c Release -r win10-x64 --self-contained false && npm run copy:build
scripts.build:development: env-cmd --environments development dotnet publish ../parole.csproj -c Release -r win10-x64 --self-contained false && npm run copy:build
scripts.copy:arcgis: npm run copy:public && npm run copy:build
scripts.wonkavise:stage:extract: env-cmd --environments stage wonkavision unzip parole deploy.zip --extra-command "rm app_offline.htm"
scripts.wonkavise:stage:ship: env-cmd --environments stage wonkavision ship ./../../deploy/deploy.zip parole && env-cmd --environments stage wonkavision ship ../app_offline.htm parole
scripts.wonkavise:stage: npm run wonkavise:stage:clean && npm run build:stage && npm run wonkavise:stage:zip && npm run wonkavise:stage:ship && npm run wonkavise:stage:extract
scripts.wonkavise:production:extract: env-cmd --environments production wonkavision unzip parole deploy.zip --extra-command "rm app_offline.htm"
scripts.wonkavise:production:ship: env-cmd --environments production wonkavision ship ./../../deploy/deploy.zip parole && env-cmd --environments production wonkavision ship ../app_offline.htm parole
scripts.wonkavise:production: npm run wonkavise:production:clean && npm run build:production && npm run wonkavise:production:zip && npm run wonkavise:production:ship && npm run wonkavise:production:extract
